text: Maryamin () is a village in the southern Aleppo countryside, Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. Located some south of the city of Aleppo and some east of al-Hader. Administratively, the village belongs to Nahiya al- Hader in Mount Simeon District. Nearby localities include al-Jumaymah to the northeast, and Kafr Abid to the east. In the 2004 census, Maryamin had a population of 1,045. ==References==
title: Maryamin Samaan
